title: Bolt of Magma
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|Fires a penetrating bolt of molten rock. A portion of its damage bypasses fire resistance.}} '''Bolt of Magma''' is a monster-only spell which deals 50% irresistible [[fire]] damage (only 50% damage is affected by [[fire resistance]]). As a [[bolt spell]], it penetrates through enemies. {{monsters with spell}} ==History== {{Spell |name=Bolt of Magma |level=5 |school1={{Conjurations}} |school2={{Fire Magic}} |school3={{Earth Magic}} |sources=
*[[Book of Earth]]
|castingnoise=5 |spellnoise=5 }}{{AttackSpell |name=Bolt of Magma |formula = 4d(4+Power/6) [[fire]] |maxdmg = 4d38 |maxsp = 200 |range = 4 |target = Bolt |tohit = 8+Power/25 |special = Partially irresistible |hit_type = normal |hit_adder = 8 |hit_num = 1 |hit_denom = 25 |dam_calculator = calcdice |dam_numdice = 4 |dam_adder = 16 |dam_num = 2 |dam_denom = 3}} *Prior to [[0.30]], Bolt of Magma was 55% resistible. *Prior to [[0.28]], Bolt of Magma was a player-castable level 5 [[Conjurations]]/[[Fire Magic]]/[[Earth Magic]] spell. * Prior to [[0.26]], [[bolt spell]]s would decrease by 1 range for every target they hit. *Prior to [[0.12]], Bolt of Magma did less damage.
